660:1: atha khalu bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
660:2: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ ! ekākṣaracakravartinasya mahānubhāvasya saṃkṣepeṇa paṭavidhānaṃ bhavati |
660:4: adhunā saṃkṣepeṇa yugādhame sattvā alpavīryā bhavanti,
660:8: uttamārthaṃ tu yathā siddhiḥ prāpnuvanti sa jāpinaḥ ||
660:9: uttamasādhanaṃ kartukāmena anāhate paṭe acchinnadaśe keśāpagate aśleṣakairvarṇairbhagavāṃ citrāpayitavyaḥ |
660:10: dharmarājā dharmacakrapravarttakaḥ sarvalokādhipatiḥ puruṣottamaḥ dvipadānāmagryaḥ tathāgataratnaḥ ratnaketurnāmā jinottamaḥ dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ samantajvālaprabhāmaṇḍalaḥ |
660:17: dvādaśāraṃ puṣpalohamayaṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā prātihārakapakṣe bhagavato'gratastrisandhyamagarudhūpaṃ dahatā daśa lakṣāṇi japet |
660:28: suvarṇacakracihnaṃ kauśeyavastrāvalambitaṃ tenānenaiva vidhānena śirasi kṛtvā japed,
660:35: māse māse paurṇamāsyāṃ pañcabhiḥ pakṣaiḥ prātihārikapakṣe siddhyati |
660:40: athoṣṇīṣaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ hastamātre daṇḍe sauvarṇarajatatāmramayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvat prajvalitamiti |
660:44: atha bhadraghaṭaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇaṃ bhadraghaṭaṃ kṛtvā sarvabījaratnauṣadhiparipūrṇaṃ śuklavastrāvakuṇṭhitaṃ tamanena sādhayed ekasmiṃ prātihārakapakṣe karmārabhed,
660:46: tasmiṃ haste prakṣipya yamicchati taṃ labhate |
660:48: atha cintāmaṇiratnaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ sauvarṇadaṇḍo jātyamaṇiṃ sphaṭikamaṇiṃ ca sauvarṇaṃ vā vastrāvalambantaṃ kṛtvā anenaiva vidhānena sādhayed,
660:54: anye vā yorasitātapatraprakhyādayaḥ tadapyanena bhagavato daśalakṣajaptena karmāṇi kartavyāni siddhyanti |
660:55: evamapratihataḥ tathāgatoṣṇīṣaḥ parakalpavidhānenāpi yathā yathā prayujyati,
660:57: acirādeva bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaḥ daśalakṣajaptaḥ sarvaṃ sādhayati sarvavidyāmantrādhipaticakravartī ||
660:58: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ ekasūcikaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā,
660:66: anenoṣṇīṣarājā parivāreṇa tejorāśisitātapatreṇa vā rakṣāṃ kṛtvā,
660:69: prathame yāme'tikrānte dvitīye yāme upaviśya ekāgracittaḥ tāvajjaped,
660:86: ākuñcitakuṇḍalakeśaḥ dviraṣṭavarṣākṛtiḥ apanthadāyī agamyaḥ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ antarakalpaṃ jīvati ||
660:88: vīrakrayeṇa krītvā puṣpayogatrirātroṣitaḥ saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ bhikṣāṃ bhojayitvā ājñā dāpayitavyā |
660:92: trirātroṣitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ maitracittamutpādya ātmānaṃ niryātya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped,
660:105: trīṇi varṣasahasrāṇi jīvati jvalitena vidyādharo bhavati |
660:108: devakumāravapuḥ adharṣaṇīyaḥ sarvadevānāṃ kaḥ punarvidyādharāṇāṃ kalpasthāyī bhavati |
660:126: trinetraḥ dvitīya iva maheśvaraḥ sarvavidyādharanamaskṛtaḥ mahākalpasthāyī nirīkṣitamātreṇa duṣṭacittāṃ pātayati |
660:128: sadevake loke prāgeva vidyādharāṇāṃ cyutaḥ sukhāvatyāvupapadyate ||
660:159: vajraṃ kuryāt tathaiva sitātapatrasya ātmano rakṣā kartavyā |
660:160: tejorāśinā maṇḍalabandhaṃ vikareṇena kīlakāṃ saptābhimantritāṃ kṛtvā,
660:162: athābandhaṃ sthānaṃ ca parigrahaṃ kṛta bhavati |
660:163: tato dvitīye prahare ekāgramanāḥ paryaṅkaṃ badhvā,
660:164: aṅkuśaṃ gandhapuṣpadhūpairabhyarcya kṛtarakṣaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāṃ namaskṛtya aṅkuśaṃ hastena gṛhya tāvajjaped yāvadatrāntare narakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ vedanānyupaśāmyante |
660:173: yamicchati kalpaṃ sādhayituṃ tasya mantrasya nāmaṃ grahāya lakṣaṃ japedante ekārātroṣitaḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya tilānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāmaṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
660:177: atha maheśvaraṃ kartukāmaḥ maheśvarasya mahatiṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇāyāṃ mūrttau arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt|
660:179: na bhetavyaṃ tata āgacchati bravīti kiṃ karttavyā sarve maheśvarā vidyā mama siddhā bhavantu |
660:185: atha yakṣiṇī ākarṣayitukāmaḥ tasya nāmaṃ gṛhya saptāhamaśokapuṣpāṇi juhuyāt |
660:192: ante ekarātroṣitaḥ bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabaliṃ codanāni nivedya yakṣakarṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmīti manasi kṛtvā vaṭavṛkṣasamidhāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
660:196: vaktavyāḥ ekaikaṃ dine yakṣa ājñākaraṃ yakṣaṃ preṣayeti |
660:206: atha vajrapāṇiṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ caturguṇaṃ saptaguṇaṃ pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā prātihārakapakṣe sakalāmudāratarāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā yāvat pūrṇamāsīti pūrṇamāsyāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhikṣavaḥ saṅghoddiṣṭakāṃ bhojayitvā āryavajradharasthaiva anumoditavyā tata udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā prathame yāme'tikrānte dvitīye yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā upaviśyaikāgramanasaḥ vajradharaṃ drakṣyāmīti cittaṃ saṅkalpya guggulugulikānāṃ badarāsthipramāṇāṃ rātrāvekayāmaṃ juhuyāt |
660:211: atrāntare bhagavāṃ vajrapāṇirāgacchanti sarvavidyābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ vidyottamapramukhaiḥ vidyārājaiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sarvanāgaiḥ sarvayakṣaiḥ sarvagandharvaiḥ kinnarairbodhisattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ āgacchati |
660:212: tatkṣaṇaṃ nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ tīvravedanā vyuparatā bhavanti |
660:214: praṇipatya sthātavyaṃ ato vajradharo vakṣyati kiṃ te varaṃ dadāmi |
660:215: vidyādharacakravarttitvaṃ bilapraveśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ antardhānaṃ yadvā rocate tasyaiva bhagavataḥ sakāśāllabhyate |
660:216: yadvā rocati vidyādharacakravartittvaṃ sarvavidyādharāṇāṃ cakravarttī vajrakāyo vajrapāṇisadṛśaḥ cittamātreṇa sarvapraharaṇānyutpadyante |
660:219: anyeṣāmapi vidyādharāṇāṃ eṣa eva vidhiḥ saṃkṣepato yāni vajrapāṇikalpe yāni avalokiteśvarakalpe yāni ca bhagavatā proktāni kalpāni yāni brahmakalpe yāni maheśvarakalpe saṃkṣepato laukikalokottareṣu kalpeṣu ye śādhanīyāḥ,
660:222: anena sārddhaṃ japtavyāḥ saptarātraṃ niyataṃ darśanaṃ dadāti |
660:224: maheśvarapramukhānāṃ devānāṃ agrataḥ yadi japati saptarātrābhyantareṇa darśanaṃ dadāti |
660:225: yadi na dadāti trisaptadhā mūrdhnā sphuṭati |
660:227: atha dravyaṃ sādhayitukāmasya manaḥśilāṃ gṛhya mānuṣakṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā pañcagulikā karttavyā |
660:229: candragrahe sūryagrahe vā balividhānaṃ kṛtvā yadā sarṣapa ciṭiciṭīyanti tathā prathamā siddhā yā vā sarvajanavaśīkaraṇaṃ tayā sarvasya laukikeyā vidheyā bhavanti |
660:233: jvalite tadā devakumāravapuḥ taruṇārkatejo vidyādhararājā bhavati |
660:236: athāñjanaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ śrotāñjanaṃ nīlotpalaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ candanaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā tāmrabhājane saṃsthāpya candragrahe tāvajjaped yāvad dhūmāyati |
660:237: tenāñjitanayanaḥ antarddhīyate kāmarūpī sarvāntarddhānikānā rājā bhavati ||
660:238: atha khaḍgā sādhayitukāmaḥ nirvraṇaṃ khaḍgamādāya kṛṣṇāṣṭamyāṃ kṛṣṇacaturdaśyāṃ vā paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā balividhānaṃ ca kṛtarakṣaḥ khaḍgaṃ dakṣiṇahastena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāva sphurati |
660:241: apratihatabalaparākramaḥ yairdṛśyate yāṃśca paśyati taiḥ sahotpatati ||
660:242: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ puṣpalohamayaṃ vajraṃ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśāṅgulaṃ ubhayatriśūcakaṃ raktacandanenānulipya prātihārakapakṣaprattipadamārabhya paṭasyodārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā japet pratidinaṃ varddhamānā bhikṣavo bhojayitavyā |
660:243: ante trirātroṣitaḥ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ghṛtapradīpaśataṃ prajvālya kuśapiṇḍakopaviṣṭaḥ vajramubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti |
660:248: evaṃ śūlacakraśaraśaktiprabhṛtaya sarve praharaṇāḥ paṭapādukadaṇḍakāṣṭhayajñopavītādīni parakalpavidhānena sādhayitavyāni |
660:250: śāntikaṃ kartukāmaḥ padmākāraṃ vediṃ kṛtvā yājñikaiḥ samidbhiragniṃ prajvālya sruveṇa paramānnāhutīnāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
660:258: prātihārakapakṣe śuklapūrṇamāsyāṃ trirātroṣitaḥ candragrahe kṛṣṇagokṣīra aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pibed rasāyanaṃ guṇopetaṃ bhavati |
660:264: sarvavrīhigandhodakaparipūrṇaṃ navaṃ kalaśaṃ kṛtvā aṣṭaśatajaptena vināyakopadrutaṃ spṛṣṭvā snāpayet |
660:273: samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya raktacandanāktānāṃ padmānāṃ śatasahasraṃ pravāhayet |
660:278: devāṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ agarusamidhānāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ juhuyāt aṣṭasahasraṃ |
660:282: aśokasamidbhiryakṣiṇīnām nāgānāṃ nāgapuṣpāṃ āryavajravajrapāṇiragarusamidhābhiḥ vidyādharāṇāṃ damanakasamidhābhiḥ agurusamidhānāṃ turuṣkatailāktānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ kunduruhomena pretānāṃ śrīvāsakahomena kinnarāṇāṃ sarjarasahomena vināyakānāṃ sarveṣāmaṣṭaśatiko homaḥ saptāhaṃ rājānasya rājasarṣapatailāktānāṃ aṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt |
660:283: trisandhyaṃ saptarātraṃ ādityābhimukhaṃ lakṣaṃ japet sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyati ||
660:284: sarvavidyānāmāpyayanaṃ kartukāmaḥ gomūtrayāvakāhāraḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklapuṣpairabhyarcya kṣīrāṣṭaśataṃ juhuyāt |
660:289: dviruccāritena parasya triruccāritena dravyasya rakṣā kṛtā bhavati ||
660:290: chinnabhinnanaṣṭakīlitānāṃ āpyāyanaṃ kartukāmaḥ uśīramayīṃ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā śuklaṣuṣpairabhyarcya anena uṣṇīṣarājena paṭasyāgrataḥ rājasarṣapāṇāṃ dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
660:292: pāpijanātiriktāṃ vidyāṃ jñātvā gorocanayā bhūrjapatre likhya tataḥ ātmamantramaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā anena bhagavatā sārddhaṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ japtvā tatraiva kuśasaṃstare svapet |
660:294: atha padmaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ raktacandanamayaṃ padmaṃ kṛtvā udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā trirātroṣitaḥ taṃ padmaṃ dakṣiṇena hastena gṛhītvā tāvajjaped yāvajjvalitamiti |
660:299: atha vajraṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamiśrayā mṛttikayā vālukamiśrayā vajraṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāhāraḥ maunī apatthadāyī vajraṃ gṛhya trīṇi lakṣa japet |
660:301: taṃ vajramante siddhārthakamadhye sthāpya candragrahe candragrahe sthātavyam |
660:318: uṣṇīṣacakravarttinaṃ sādhayato na kaścicchaknoti vighnaṃ kartum |
660:320: asya ca jāpakāle satataṃ buddhalocanāṃ pūrvaṃ paścācca japtavyam |
660:323: atha samudragāminīṃ nadīmavatīrya padmānāṃ lakṣa nivedayet |
660:329: vivarasyāgrataḥ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya lakṣāṇi trīṇi japet |
660:337: śuklapratipadamārabhya triḥkālaṃ jātīkusumaiḥ sakṛjjaptena bhagavatā pādāṅguṣṭhe tāḍayitavyam |
660:343: atha samudrataṭe paścānmukhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya nāgakāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya samudrasyauddiśya nāgapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ juhuyāt |
660:351: padmaṃ bhūmyāṃ likhya sahasrapatraṃ tasyoparyupaviśya śatasahasraṃ japet |
660:355: prātihārakapakṣe jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣarājasyopari lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
660:360: daśalakṣajaptaḥ yathā yathā prayujyati tathā tathā anenaiva bhagavatā sārddhaṃ yadi vidyā japyate sā niyatamāgacchati |
660:361: sākṣādasya japyamānā yadi na vāgacchati sa mūrdhnā sphuṭati | śuṣyati ||
660:362: ayaṃ ca ekākṣara uṣṇīṣacakravartī tathāgata eva sākṣāt ko'nyaḥ sadevake loke sarvamantravidyānāṃ rājā tathāgata eva |
660:371: yatra nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra gatvā akālakalaśaṃ gṛhya sarvagandhairlipya śvetacandanodakaṃ kumbhe prakṣipya aṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā nidhānaṃ sthāpayet |
660:372: yadi nidhānaṃ tiṣṭhati tadā sa bhūmiḥ sphuṭati |
660:373: yadi nidhānaṃ puruṣamātre tiṣṭhati udakena spraṣṭavyam |
660:375: atha siṃhaṃ sādhayitukāmaḥ valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā gorocanayā samālabhya piṇḍikāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tāvajjaped yāvacalati |
660:381: yadā siṃhanādaṃ nadati tadā devā āsanebhyaścalanti ||
660:386: jātīpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ samudragāminyāṃ nadyāṃ pravāhayet kanyāṃ labhate yāmicchati |
660:388: anenoṣṇīṣacakravartinā sa yatra gacchati indro'pyasyāsanaṃ dadāti |
660:389: sarve ca devarājānaḥ dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā bhītā trastā bhavanti |
660:390: sarveṣāṃ ca devarājānāṃ prabhāṃ prabhāṃ vyāmīkaroti |
660:392: ayaṃ cakravartī tathāgata eṣa devaloke sarve ca kalpasya bhagavataḥ uṣṇīṣacakravartinaḥ ekākṣarasya vaśe vartanti |
660:393: tannimnāśca sarve mantratantrāḥ sakalpakāḥ savistarā ityāha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ siṃho narottama iti ||
